description.value:
Your connection to this divine domain ensures you always have certain spells ready. When you reach a Cleric level specified in the Twilight Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Twilight Domain Spells
Cleric LevelSpells
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSleep00000]{Sleep}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMoonbeam00]{Moonbeam}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSeeInvisib]{See Invisibility}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAuraOfVita]{Aura of Vitality}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplTinyHut000]{Tiny Hut}
7th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAuraOfLife]{Aura of Life}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGreaterInv]{Greater Invisibility}
9th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCircleOfBu]{Circle of Power}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMislead000]{Mislead}
